ModMetaData.description: A mod aimed at changing smokeleaf to be less deadly, and less stereotypical, while also adding a small production chain. --- Changelog: v1.5.0 -1.4 Update, Hemp Fabric added, stats adjusted --- Contains: Smokeleaf Changes: • Getting high now effects Talking, Manipulation, and Moving instead of Conciousness • The High Effect now had 3 Stages. (buzzed, high, stoned) New Hediff: • Pneumonitis: (inflamamtion of lungs) Replaces Asthma as primary effect Asthma replaces Carcinoma New Recipes: • Make Hempen Fabric • Make Herbal Medicine from Smokeleaf • Make Hash from Smokeleaf • Make Chemfuel from Smokeleaf New Research: Smokeleaf Weaving Herbal Medicine Smokeleaf Refining Version 1.5.0
